name: RiskAdjustmentEvidenceStatusCodeSystem
title: Risk Adjustment Evidence Status Code System
description: (The Da Vinci Risk Adjustment Implementation Guide is under development). This is a code system for Risk Adjustment evidence status to indicate whether the evidence is confirmed, non-confirmed, or pending.

concept.definition: Evidence to support an HCC gap was confirmed.
Evidence to support an HCC gap has not yet been confirmed.
Evidence to support an HCC gap is pending to be confirmed or not confirmed.
